segments.text: Looking at the woman at the sink, I can't help but admire her focus.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that admiration quickly turns to disbelief as I see the sink overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How could she be so unaware of the mess sheâ€™s standing in?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water just keeps pouring over, and I feel a knot tightening in my stomach.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then I see the children, with their eyes gleaming at the sight of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching precariously on that wobbly stool, and I fear it might tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, her expectation palpable as she reaches up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their innocence and excitement clash with the risk of what's happening here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I almost wish I could freeze time to prevent the fall and the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen transforms from a mundane space into a stage for impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
